THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How_the_thumbnail_visually_reinforces_th: The inclusion of two serious-looking men, one who appears to be a psychiatrist or analyst and one who is recognizable as a public figure (presumably Prince Harry), directly visualizes the 'psychiatrist breaks it down' concept. The quote relating to the royal family directly supports the theme of 'The Real Reason Harry Can’t Move On,' suggesting analysis and internal/external conflict.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any_contrasts_or_mismatches_between_thum: The only slight contrast is that the thumbnail heavily emphasizes family conflict and dissatisfaction ('fed up with him'), whereas the title promises an explanation about Harry's inability to move on—suggesting personal struggle—so the focus could seem more on external blame in the thumbnail than internal psychological reasons.
